name: Color Me Happy
description:
Tower Defence X Coloring Games X Shooter 

Made for Mix and Gamejam 2020 in 48 hours time frame.

Oh no world has lost its colors!Color the world again and save the planet!

Defend the last rainbow from evil guys by coloring yourself and building towers while painting the world!

-WASD to move

-Mouse Left to shoot/build tower/select

-Mouse Right to reload/destroy tower

-Space to switch modes(Building mode/Shooting mode)

-E to swap colors with selected tower
